title: The College Dropout
description: First Kanye West album and one of if not my favourite one.
notes: Just skimmed through most of it besides listening to Two Words all the way through. I've heard this album so many times.

tracks.title: Intro
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: We Don't Care
tracks.notes: It's just such a catchy and good song.

tracks.title: Graduation Day
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: All Falls Down
tracks.notes: I love Syleena Johnson's singing on the beat of this song.

tracks.title: I'll Fly Away
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: Spaceship
tracks.notes: "Lock yourself in a room doing five beats a day for three summers" Hard.

tracks.title: Jesus Walks
tracks.notes: My dads favourite on the album. Classic Kanye song.

tracks.title: Get Em High
tracks.notes: I love the first flow on this track.

tracks.title: Workout Plan
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: The New Workout Plan
tracks.notes: This song is so fun to listen to.

tracks.title: Slow Jamz
tracks.notes: Jamie Foxx on that podcast

tracks.title: School Spirit Skit 1
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: School Spirit Skit 2
tracks.notes: Interlude

tracks.title: Lil Jimmy Skit
tracks.notes: Interlude "IDK where I'm going, my dad died"

tracks.title: Two Words
tracks.notes: Listening to this again made me realize how good it is

tracks.title: Through The Wire
tracks.notes: One of the greatest Kanye songs.

tracks.title: Last Call
tracks.notes: Long ahh song

title: Sunset Polaroids
description: Warm guitar textures and nostalgic lyrics that feel like flipping through old photographs.
notes: Played this on a long weekend drive. The mid-album stretch is mellow but the closing track saves it.

tracks.title: Golden Hour
tracks.notes: Effortless hook. The slide guitar gives it a sun-soaked glow.

tracks.title: Paper Planes
tracks.notes: Pretty verses, the chorus doesn't fully land for me.

tracks.title: Harborview
tracks.notes: Great storytelling and a punchy outro.

tracks.title: Window Seat
tracks.notes: Quiet closer, feels like a soft exhale.
